stepTitle: A ball is thrown straight up. It passes a $$2.00-m-high$$ window $$7.50$$ $$m$$ off the ground on its path up and takes $$0.312$$ s to go past the window. What was the ball’s initial velocity?
stepBody: Hint: First consider only the distance along the window, and solve for the ball's velocity at the bottom of the window.
